original_title: Game Over: The True Story to the movie Paid In Full
overview: You saw the movie PAID IN FULL. Now here is the uncut documentary of the rise and fall of Richard Porter, AZ, and Alpo. Living by the code of the streets, these three best friends pursued the American dream and became major players in the New York drug trade by the ages of 16 and 17.
title: Game Over: The True Story to the movie Paid In Full
